mapper.select: select distinct elm_address from en_location_manage where di_id=#{diId}
mapper.update: update en_location_manage set elm_status=#{status},elm_length=#{length} where elm_address=#{address} and di_id=#{ipId}
mapper.select: select elm_id,elm_name,sdl_name from en_location_manage as elm,sys_device_location as sdl where elm.sdl_id=sdl.sdl_id and elm.elm_address=#{address} and elm.di_id=#{ipId}
